bibl.title: P. Oxy. 5094: Asios, Son of Dymas, or Asios, Son of Hyrtakos? Demetrios of Skepsis on Homonymies in the Iliad.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXXVI, 5094 (= M.-P.3 2451.09; LDAB 130499). - 1. Introduction. - 2. Demetrios' Τρωϊκὸς διάκοσμος. - 3. Linking the new papyrus to Demetrios' work. - 4. Consequences for our understanding of Demetrios' work.
bibl.seg: Alexandra Trachsel, P. Oxy. 5094: Asios, Son of Dymas, or Asios, Son of Hyrtakos? Demetrios of Skepsis on Homonymies in the Iliad.
